title: Ali Siahkoohi
text:
Research
My research tackles uncertainty quantification in complex systems arising in computational science and engineering, with a focus on building reliable, uncertainty-aware AI systems. To this end, my team develops methods that leverage tools like generative models, variational inference, and hypernetworks to characterize uncertainty in complex models at scale, with implications for large-scale, PDE-based inverse problems.
